Html: Has anyone been able to successfully change the font size of the link text in this template. I am trying to use this template for a 10" touch enabled POS interface for a cafeteria. The links are entirely to small for touch. Any help would be much appreciated.
I just came on looking for a similar question, so I'll ask it here. I was hoping to style the DisplayName of Links using BBCode. Any way to get that?

You have to download the Sourcecode and edit it in the XAML.
Then you compile it and use it in your Projekt ;)
